website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive 3-tier party tray that collapses down to a small size for storage.
pros: Plenty of space between the tiers, so guests can access the items easily
Round trays have different diameters, which looks nice and simplifies loading the tiers
cons: Plastic, so it's not the most durable

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these!!! So glad I ordered them. Affordable, sturdy, compact. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: ccc1184

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dessert Table Addition
customer_reviews.text: This party tray was the perfect addition to our dessert table. It wasnt too small or too large, it was just right. And the collapsable design was perfect for storage. It is plastic so it was easy to clean and sturdy enough for multiple usage.
customer_reviews.author: KweenBie

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste the money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste the money... very cheap. Tray is very flimsy and doesn't lock in place when it's unfolded. Im a longtime Prime member and until this item I've never been charged return shipping and it cost more money to ship it back than it did to purchase the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 3-tier tray!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too crazy about the price but I really like the product. I've already used the 3-tier tray for a couple of different events and it was nice. It looked great with all of the other decorations on the table. I ended buying two trays so I that I can put one on each side. I'll definitely be using these trays again for future events. Very sturdy, easy to wash. and easy to fold/unfold.
customer_reviews.author: Adidoreydi

customer_reviews.title: Great product, no assembly required!
customer_reviews.text: This worked out great for my son's graduation party. Wish I'd have bought more of them. They collapse just by pushing down a bit on them to go right back in the slim box it came in. Was surprised it's a fully assembled out of the box and ready to use in a second product. Just what I've been looking for. Functional and easy to store. A must have item if you do a lot of gatherings at your home like we do.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easy to clean and easy to storage
customer_reviews.author: Jenny P

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT, buy as many as you can!
customer_reviews.text: When I tell you these things are handy, they are handy and the fact that they’re just $10 each, they’re bomb! I bought two and I wish I would’ve gotten more. I will be purchasing more, you can legit use them for cupcakes, chocolate covered strawberries, cake pops, whatever! They’re big enough and roomy and you honestly get a kick off of unfolding them lol.
customer_reviews.author: Montana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!👍
customer_reviews.text: I am sooo glad i found these! I was a little hesitant about some of the reviews, but its exactly what i needed and super cheap. Very simple to twist and fold up and down...my 3 year old can do it and thinks its a fun new toy😂😂 I also bought the bowl one and they are filled with candy and snacks for my daughters Birthday party...very sturdy👍
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M  Smith

customer_reviews.title: can match any party easy to clean and they close up simple and fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about these even when I opened them and they scared me and popped open suddenly. But they where simple, can match any party easy to clean and they close up simple and fit back in the skinny box they came in i slid them side ways into my entertaining cabinet! I would buy these again if i needed more for a party.
customer_reviews.author: MCMsupermom

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: I would not use these if you're looking to entertain people you want to impress. They look cheap and are not able to accommodate warm/hot foods. I used them for a gathering of close friends to serve truffles, tarts, and petit fours and they served the purpose. They wash and fold flat easily. The price is very reasonable since we should be able to reuse them several times. I just wish they looked a little classier.
customer_reviews.author: Bibliophile Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy up, easy down!
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight and easy to use! I was worried that they would be difficult to twist up and down, but they popped open and shut in a cinch. Not super sturdy and not the best quality but they’re fine for the price. Easy to clean and store. Overall, I recommend. If this review was helpful please let me know by clicking the “Helpful” button below the review.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Best Impulse Purchase Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! We have potlucks throughout the year in my office, and I usually bring a dessert. The dessert table gets cluttered fast, so I wanted something tall that I could still bring a lot of desserts but take up less room on the table. I bought this thing because it was inexpensive and I hoped it would work. I was so pleasantly surprised at the look and quality of this tray! It's well made, very sturdy, and is really nice looking. I got a lot of compliments on it and everyone at work was really impressed with it. I will bring this to our potlucks every time from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for parties
customer_reviews.text: I wanted my sons birthday to be pretty and fancy for the small get together we had to have because of Covid and I prob went overboard but this was a nice touch. And it comes assembled straight out of the box. Like just pops up. Really a good piece at a great price. I just washed mine by hand in the sink and when finished did the same and put in back in box and stored for later.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Ally

customer_reviews.title: Love this product so much
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when purchasing this since it was so cheap, but I figured why not?! So I went ahead & got it because I needed one and wouldn’t be out much money if it wasn’t what I wanted. I was VERY pleasantly surprised when it came in the mail. I LOVE this thing. I use it for everything! It has came in so handy for all kinds of events from baby showers, birthday parties... to holiday gatherings and BBQ’s. I love that it just folds right up with one hand and goes right back into the box. It had been one of my favorite amazon purchases ever :)
customer_reviews.author: sugarfoot

customer_reviews.title: Stores easily. Only 1” thick when collapsed.
customer_reviews.text: Easily twists down to about 1” thick with no assembly and disassembly needed, which makes storage easy. It is not very sturdy but not super flimsy either, so it’s great for occasional use, then you can easily store it away between uses. The trays are big and easy to access, so it’s great for setting up appetizers and desserts. I used this in lieu of a cupcake stand, which would have had smaller surfaces and would not have been able to hold other foods as easily.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable stand.
customer_reviews.text: Pros Folds easily for storage. Simple design so you can use for any occasion. Holds quite a bit of cupcakes but you can use for anything else. Cons- you can’t have tall cupcake toppers. On the bottom two layers but not really a con unless you have talla ones. Overall, a great affordable buy. I bought another so I have two now.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie T

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Serving Tray
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this folding tray is wonderful. It's surprisingly sturdy, folds and unfolds very easily, and is easy to clean. I've loaded it full with sliced pinwheel sandwiches, brownies, and mini cupcakes. Clearly, it's not meant to be an eloquent crystal centerpiece at a formal banquet. But I highly recommend it for most other occasions. It's so convenient and useful.
customer_reviews.author: J R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy twist up and down but sturdy when upright!
customer_reviews.text: Love these trays! Great quality and I used them for afternoon tea. I bought three... I can easily store them and use for other parties. Much cheaper and easier than buying or drilling holes in plates for a three tier pastry tray!
customer_reviews.author: Nova mama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hosting Plate
customer_reviews.text: I finally found the solution to my hosting needs! We were hosting a GoT party with very minimal table space so I looked for serving trays that could save space. I love tiered serving trays, but they are usually so bulky and hard to put away. This foldable tiered tray is AMAZING. It is surprisingly strong and was awesome in adding levels and dimension to my table. If you host a lot of parties, get this tray!
customer_reviews.author: Yen Le

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like this thing. It is very cheap looking. It comes collapsed and when pulled up, I have been unable to collapse it again for storage, it seems to be stuck. That and the fact it looks like it came from the dollar store, I would not buy it again and would not recommend it. I'd rather use plates for my appetizers and desserts than this little plastic tree. Sorry seller, I had to be honest. :(
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to use/store party tray
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for graduation party to hold cupcakes. Liked that they are collapsable for easy storage and light weight. They worked better than expected. Not sure how they would do with heavy items but they had no problems holding all the cupcakes.
customer_reviews.author: Torie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, takes up very little space and a good item to have handy
customer_reviews.text: This party tray is amazingly easy to setup. It takes up very little space and you can take it anywhere without worrying about breaking it. I bought it to hold the sweets for the hot chocolate bar. Dont let the size fool you. It really can hold more than expected. I gave four stars because I would not describe it as elegant. It would fit great for casual settings like your everyday office party, baby showers or birthday party. If you are throwing an elegant party, I don't think it would go with the decor and theme.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: As a caterer I am always looking for great presentation pieces. I thought this would be pretty cheap looking but it actually went so well with my white plastic decor at an event. And it was so much fun 'un twisting' it! We all couldnt stop touching it. WOW how great to store, it folds down to about an inch high. It worked great for our three day event. I'm planning to buy more of these. !!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Quick way to minimize space at table
customer_reviews.text: I have used mine at least 4 times. It is so lightweight I was skeptical it would hold up. But so far am pleasantly surprised. A great thing to have on hand when space is limited. Pops up easily and down. Easy to clean. I have even bought some as gifts. I recommend, for the price it is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Makes fruit and marshmallows look superb
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these three tier trays to use at our junior/senior prom for strawberries and marshmallows for our chocolate fountain. These trays fold up for convenience when not in use. They are elegant looking and surprisingly hold a lot of strawberries and marshmallows. I will use them again next spring when prom rolls around again.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Need more!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this some months ago and have used it several times. I love it! I'm able to put quite a bit on it (heaviest on bottom tier of course) and everyone asks where I got it. Definitely when I get my own place & host company I'll be buying a couple more!
customer_reviews.author: alejandra esqueda

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: They are plastic and cheap feeling with the wires also. One was kind of bent when i received it, but it’s not bad looking from a distance. Just not great of quality, but for the price it’s not so bad
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: easy to store and great for parties
customer_reviews.text: Used this to hold a mix of desserts - bite size cupcakes, macarons, scones - during a party. Having them on the stacked trays took up far less table room and it was a really cute display. It expands and collapses easily and the box is about an inch and a half thick, we kept it to keep it stored out of the way. For something that will not be used often it was a great price. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: itchick00

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I brought for my sister's baby shower. I actually brought this to hold the strawberries and a chocolate fountain so that guest could drip the fruit in the chocolate, but then I also brought 2 glass stands for the cupcakes, and this party tray was the easiest to deal with. The twist to open was a cool trick that everyone liked and it was easy to clean. The stupid glass cupcake stands literally had to be put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome party must have !
customer_reviews.text: If you’re like me and often buy cupcakes or goodies for your baby’s bday cake table, you cannot go wrong with these. I purchased four . So easy to pop up and pop down, convenient and looks cute. Can’t go wrong! Price on point . Don’t go any higher !
customer_reviews.author: DeniseRGV

customer_reviews.title: they barely held up mini cupcakes before it started twisting ...
customer_reviews.text: they barely held up mini cupcakes before it started twisting downwards. we felt uneasy about leaving anything else on them. I will not buy again. with the picture it shows theres noway it would hold up all of those and still be standing straight. do not buy people.
customer_reviews.author: B_Oblivion

customer_reviews.title: Cool Twist Down Tray
customer_reviews.text: The twist down and fold away is the best part of this tray. I used for cookies at a gathering on New Year's Day. It held up well and like I said, the best part was that I could clean it and fold it away saving on storage space. I ordered two.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelene R.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to transport and store between parties!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son’s birthday party and they were perfect! Lightweight, easy to transport (and store until our next party). My mother-in-law decided to carry it around full of cupcakes to give one to each child and I was very nervous we were going to lose a few, but it held up. It was challenging to clean because it doesn’t come apart, but next time I’ll likely use it for things that don’t have frosting and then it’ll be easy to wipe down quickly! Love this, so glad I ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Raney

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I like this tray. Good looking, light and convenient tray. Not sure why some people gives it a negative review complaining that it is not sturdy. It was not designed to keep weight lifting plates. It was designed to keep cakes and cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Garik Syhoi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's very light weight and easy to store. It is sturdy enough to support breakfast sandwiches, bacon, and eggs. We've used it for Father's Day and birthdays to make our spread a little more special!
customer_reviews.author: Under The Table N' Dreaming

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These party trays were used to hold cupcakes for a 40th Superhero party. They were very convenient to use and easy to handle. I love the twist up and down feature...makes it compact for storage. I will be using these again for the treats table at my wedding in a few months. Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Porters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This tray was perfect for my daughters party! I love that it kind of clapses for easier storage. It easily held 2 dozen donuts. Kids were all over this tray and bumping the table and the tray held up just fine! Perfect for my needs and it was a great price. I see myself using this at all of my future parties i will host.
customer_reviews.author: jnmakosky

customer_reviews.title: Love this tray
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tray. Used it to hold cheese/crackers and olives for a party. Easy to set up and pack away for the next use. Super light weight and easy to clean. I would only recommend putting light items on this tray that aren't too heavy. Overall great product especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Des

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING! I love that it folds down. Really easy to store but it’s still sturdy enough to place food on. I recently used this for a tea party and placed little sandwiches on it. I believe it held about 12. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of cooking for the teachers at my school and this is just an easy lightweight stand that seems to be sturdy and it's easy to take it any place. I haven't used it that much yet so I can't speak to the longevity of it but so far I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome! I bought them for my wedding and I'm so glad I did. They were perfect for cookies but wouldn't have a problem holding larger/heavier items. And I love that they fold up and store so easily.
customer_reviews.author: 9ascs9

customer_reviews.title: easy tp use and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: The best part is that it collapse so it does not take up more than two inches of height to store. I bought two of these. I take these it for every party and stack my desserts. It makes my dessert table look so much nicer. Great for a DIY dessert table at a party or birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Giancarlo Henao

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely must have
customer_reviews.text: It's a great collapsable shelf for cookies, macarons, candies, small snack and what not! Finally something that does not take extra space and could be stored anywhere, even in the tiniest kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Wizard

customer_reviews.title: These little pop-ups are awesome
customer_reviews.text: These were the hit of the party. Though they do not hold a ton of food on them it is a great way to display things like cookies that you can stack and even cupcakes. They store eastleigh and fold down practically flat.
customer_reviews.author: NOLAgirlSS

customer_reviews.title: Love this, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, it kind of springs open very easily with just a twist of the nob on the top tier, and it collapses easily as well. It is very lightweight but pretty sturdy considering its collapsible. I used it for a dessert bar, it was really a great buy for ten bucks. I purchased 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to use for parties and easy to store away!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for small spaces when storing. It can hold lots of stuff but not too many heavy ones especially on the top two racks. I get lots of compliments on it! I handwash mine and towel dry before putting it away.
customer_reviews.author: Texas4ever

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Diner en Blanc
customer_reviews.text: My group decided to go the "tapas" or appetizer route at Diner en Blanc this year, so these trays were perfect!! The best part is they fold flat for transportation and storage and are very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: The tray does a good job holding up cookies and small desserts. It is also easy to store and looks nice. I washed it by hand, while trying to avoid the metal parts- not sure if they will rust. Overall, this is a good purchase to have around for parties and hosting!
customer_reviews.author: HappyOh

customer_reviews.title: Super worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is super simple and my husband thought it was dumb but I think he thinks it's great now that we use it. It saves a ton of space for parties with treats. I love that it is so easy to store. Great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget for a party
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these since I am hosting a little gathering and only wish I'd seen these years ago. I love that they pop up easily (I did break a nail so watch out) and you just twist to put away in the box so I love that they take up no space! Great wee item!
customer_reviews.author: KimW

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this assuming I'd only use it once for a brunch party, but I find myself using it all the time now. It's so convenient since it's collapsible and it's really cute, even just out on display! Will be buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Gallman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Cheap looking and flimsy. Looks better in the picture. Might be ok for a kids party. It would be easy to store since it folds flat but mine tilted a little and I don’t think it would hold much. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Party Tray
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use for my dad's surprise 60th birthday party. There was no assembly needed. You just need to pull on the tab slightly and the tray unfolds itself. Plastic is very easy to clean. Was able to old a few dozen cookies effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Leesh

customer_reviews.title: Trays for tea
customer_reviews.text: These are the best trays for a big function. They are easy to store and show case pretty food well. They are very lite weight but sturdy. They looked great on our Gospel High Tea Party.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Does what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: These worked really well. We used this for afternoon tea and it displayed nicely. Awkward to clean though. I wondered whether putting something too heavy on upper tier would cause it to collapse, but its collapsibility is why I bought it. Stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, space saver
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical at first because this was so cheap, but it turned out to be a really great purchase. We’ve used it twice as a cupcake/dessert stand and have had any issues yet. It opens and closes with ease and is great for storage. It’s not the sturdiest stand, but strong for the price that you’re paying.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like these. I would love them if they locked into place. You are always kind of worried they will collapse. Used them over the holidays and they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect space saver on your table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all the fruits and vegetables at your party. Don’t overload as it will bend a little bit. Takes up very little space which is great. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for afternoon tea!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my afternoon tea party and what a great value!! I love that it folds up easily and I kept the box it came in for easy storage. Many of my guests asked me where I got it and were amazed at the price and versatility. Now my only concern is whether I should buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great for picnics or camping!
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a tray to hold smores ingredients at a campfire, worked wonderfully! Easy to assemble and disassemble to clean and store. Perfect for what we desired.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and ingenious
customer_reviews.text: I love that you twist it to stand it up and to put it away. I like how it looks but more than one person has told me it looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Great for a dessert table!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to display mini cupcakes at our wedding and they were perfect. I love that they collapse into a compact size so I can store them away in kitchen nicely. I really liked these!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, good quality! I doubt buying this because some of the reviews but honestly it is pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew&Rubi M.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product for great price. The plastic is strong and sturdy so I’ll be able to use them for a while. They store basically flat, and the twist mechanism is easy to use. They make a great platter to displaying multiple pastries or appetizers. Highly recommend getting and I will definitely buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: What a smart product!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a smart product. We used it twice in six weeks to display birthday cupcakes for our two daughters. So easy to open and close. Classy looking without a big price tag AND so easy to collapse and store. Wish I'd have found it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It feels like it should be flimsy but it is not. It’s great for pitch ins where table space is at a minimum. It is a vertical presentation for deserts, hors douvres etc. I am amazed with it
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Eberle

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to clean and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: These worked so well for our wedding to display mini desserts! They are lightweight and easy to clean. They fold into a really compact size which is great for storage. I will definitely be using these again!
customer_reviews.author: A Clare

customer_reviews.title: Had a ton of fun serving high tea with these
customer_reviews.text: Had a ton of fun serving high tea with these. Then just close 'em up, and put them away flat till next time. I expected them to be flimsy, but they are not. Held up well. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy to Have
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome serving tray. It’s a bit awkward to clean in the sink, but a small inconvenience for how fun and easy to store this item is.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Space saving tiered trays
customer_reviews.text: I just love these tiered party trays! I’ve used them for my daughters birthday party and I will be able to use them for many other events to come!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Easy storage
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet. But cool how it pops u and down. I think it will work perfect for my cookies for my daughters graduation party.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for a party we had & love this item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a party we had & love this item! I used to for muffins for a brunch & worked great! Also love its easy to fold down design which saves a TON of space to store.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this tray for my baby shower and it was perfect! We were running late so setting up had to be quick and I was so impressed with this. You just pull up and it all opens together. So easy, cute and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and very cute! Holds more than you think! We squeezed 24 cupcake on it. Best part is, it’s collapsible and stores well. Totally would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Saltypancake88

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties.
customer_reviews.text: Great "extra" appetizers tray. Comes in handy for the lightweight extras. Haven't tried putting anything too heavy on it for fear that it might possibly collapse but I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: midwest gal

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are so handy! I love that they are space savers because they collapse! These are sturdy enough to hold finger foods and easy to clean. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: EmEm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money. It’s awesome easy to open and close holds cup cakes no problem and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Melissa jay

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit at my party! so easy to bring to the park and not worry if i was going to lose any parts or if it was going to break. Easy to clean and set up. I highly recommend this to anyone who loves to throw parties.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Best tiered display for food shows!!
customer_reviews.text: I do a good bit of food shows and used to bring this heavy glass 3 tier display that I had to screw together. I bought 2 of these and they are so lightweight, easy to pack and pop up in literally a split second. They are very sturdy, as well. So happy with this purchase! I even had attendees ask if I sold them and where they could buy some.
customer_reviews.author: KHebert

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: Clever design! Easily folds up after use. We take this on our boat to share appetizers or desserts when we go to boating rendezvous with potlucks.
customer_reviews.author: bjh

customer_reviews.title: Genius tiered tray.
customer_reviews.text: This tiered tray is genius. Super easy to assemble and collapse. It was a little wobbly, but did its job and still my favorite tiered tray.
customer_reviews.author: Jen83

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The doll looked like the description. It was soft and the clothes were pretty. I did not look at anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Fay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy/Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I thought it would look cheap because of the plastic and the design, but looks great. The folding mechanism is very neat and it appears very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I really like this because I can store it away in my tiny kitchen with no problem. The only thing is it can kind of bounce back once it's collapsed, so I keep it stored in the box.

It is functional but probably cannot handle too heavy of items and if pushed on too hard, it will collapse on itself as it is designed to do, but for light things that don't require putting any pressure on them, it's perfect.

product_meta.title: Collapsible Party Tray, 3 Tier - The Decorative Plastic Appetizer Trays Twist Down and Fold Inside for Minimal Storage Space. An Elegant Tray for Serving Sandwiches, Cake, Sliced Cheese and Deli Meat.
product_meta.description: This patented three tiered set of party trays is a fun and attractive way to serve guests at your next gathering. They are perfect for holding main food dishes such as sandwiches or bagels, sliced cheeses and deli meats. Alternatively, they’re an elegant way to present cut up fruits. Assorted cookies, cakes, muffins and pastries will also look lovely on these tiered trays. This set is suitable for any occasion. It’s ideal to use at home for family barbeques and holiday dinners. You’ll want to keep one at work too for business meetings and office parties. Best of all, you don’t need a large area to store this item. The trays twist down and nest inside each other, so the whole set takes up minimal storage space. When ready to use, simply twist to pop up and create your triple tower of serving trays. Manufactured from ABS material, these trays are strong, reliable and made to last. Elegant, yet simple and ideal for any occasion, this three tiered serving piece is a great gift item as well.
feature_bullets: REQUIRES MINIMAL STORAGE SPACE: The decorative trays twist down and nest in one another making it easy to store.
VARIETY OF USES: These plastic serving trays are great for holding sandwiches, cakes, muffins, fruits or whatever you’d like to serve.
GREAT FOR ANY OCCASION: Perfect appetizer tray to use at holiday dinners, family barbeques, office parties or any special event.
GREAT GIFT ITEM: This three tiered set of trays is a lovely gift idea for teachers,
STRONG AND DURABLE: These food trays are manufactured from ABS material, making them sturdy and reliable.
